name: Maple-Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Apples and Cranberries
author: JulieA
summary: Always a hit and much-requested recipe. I suggest you double the recipe 'cause everyone loves it! Have made a day ahead and marinated in fridge. Have found it best to add the apples, cranberries, and walnuts in the last 5 to 7 minutes.
ingredients: 1 large Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored, and diced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup dried cranberries, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine Brussels sprouts and apple in a large bowl
Whisk together olive oil, maple syrup, and balsamic vinegar in a small bowl and pour over Brussels sprouts-apple mixture
Toss until well combined and distribute in one layer on a baking sheet
Roast in the preheated oven until Brussels sprouts are tender and browned, 10 to 15 minutes, turning them after about 6 minutes
